prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The KISS principle (Keep It Simple, Stupid) is a well-known guideline in software development that emphasizes the importance of simplicity. It suggests that systems work best when they are kept simple rather than made complex.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: KISS principle, Keep It Simple Stupid, software development, simplicity, systems, complexity
